title: SOFI blackout violation - lost $40.74
content: Traded SOFI during earnings blackout period (Jan 30 earnings). Violated multiple rules: (1) Not SPY/IWM only, (2) Used CSP not spread, (3) Ignored blackout. Result: -$40.74 loss. NEVER trade stocks with earnings < 16 days away.

metadata.root_cause: Ignored earnings calendar and ticker hierarchy

action_items: ALWAYS check earnings calendar before ANY trade
